redirects.comments:
This rule works when Google is your default search engine. If you start an search-bar search with “gpt ”, Redirect Web skips Google and takes you straight to ChatGPT with whatever follows “gpt ”. To use a different trigger word, just replace “gpt ” in the rule with your own.

You can add these options:

- `q={your text}`: your ChatGPT prompt
- `hints=search`: turns on ChatGPT's search mode
- `temporary-chat=true`: opens a one-time chat
- `model={model name}`: picks which model to use (e.g. "gpt-4o", "o3")
redirects.title: Google Search “gpt ” Prefix → ChatGPT
